DocAttribute.Name: Identifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifier of the work plan, given by user.

DocAttribute.Name: CreationDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: The date that the plan is created.

DocAttribute.Name: Creators
DocAttribute.Documentation: The authors of the work plan.

DocAttribute.Name: Purpose
DocAttribute.Documentation: A description of the purpose of the work schedule.

DocAttribute.Name: Duration
DocAttribute.Documentation: The total duration of the entire work schedule.

DocAttribute.Name: TotalFloat
DocAttribute.Documentation: The total time float of the entire work schedule.

DocAttribute.Name: StartTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: The start time of the schedule.

DocAttribute.Name: FinishTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: The finish time of the schedule.

DocAttribute.Name: WorkControlType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined work control types from which that required may be set.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedControlType
DocAttribute.Documentation: A user defined work control type.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedControlType must be asserted when the value of the IfcWorkControlTypeEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
